primevc.gui.core.IUIElement

type
interface
implements
primevc.gui.traits.IPropertyValidator
primevc.gui.traits.IStylable

primevc.core.traits.IIdentifiable

primevc.gui.traits.ILayoutable
primevc.gui.display.IDisplayObject

Instance Variables

effects : primevc.gui.effects.UIElementEffects

Collection of effects that are defined for this UIElement. The UIElementEffects object won't be created by an UIElement but has to be set the first time an effect is added to the UIElement.

state(default,null) : primevc.gui.states.UIElementStates
